name: r-histonehmm

owner.description: Bioconda is a distribution of bioinformatics software realized as a channel for the versatile Conda package manager.
owner.name: bioconda

summary: histoneHMM is a software to analyse ChIP-seq data of histone modifications with broad genomic footprints like H3K27me3. It allows for calling modified regions in single samples as well as for calling differentially modified regions in a comparison of two samples
